title: Using Keycloak Admin Client with Quarkus
summary: This guide details how to incorporate the Keycloak Admin Client into a Quarkus application for managing Keycloak realms, clients, and users programmatically. It explains both dependency setup and client injection methods with examples in Java, demonstrating configurations for direct API operations on a Keycloak server. The guide also covers different authentication grants like password and client_credentials for secure Admin API interactions, and advises on testing setups with Dev Services for Keycloak.
